Text.Page:
Other wendigos led by {@LinkCreature:34#5001#Kaijas}. He not willing to share shards.

If you kill him, other wendigos might be willing to listen to Krrevaas.

More important than strength is honor. Madyar has it. has it also.

Krrevaas will speak to wendigos. Will talk sharing the shards with your people."As will I."
Then we part as allies. When next we meet, Krrevaas hopes it will be as friends.
Both sides lose if the shards disappear. Time running out to work together.
You're returning to Icebase Stalker? I feel I must stay here and aid the wendigos. Will you thank Lalash for his concern?

All this fighting and misery over shards of crystal.

Madyar's point is well taken, we are not the only tenants of this world. I will discuss your reports with the praetor. Perhaps policy can shift in time to avert disaster.

Dismissed!
